thread.title: Shannon Dawson says Boom has a “great attitude” right now
thread.title_full: Shannon Dawson says Boom has a “great attitude” right now

author: Mrs. Tyler Thompson
title: Shannon Dawson says Boom has a “great attitude” right now
text:
Posted in Football , Main | Leave a response Photo by UK Athletics 
After sitting out the Eastern game amid some drama, Boom Williams is back atop the depth chart at running back. Judging by Mark Stoops and Shannon Dawson’s remarks this afternoon, everyone’s moved on from what happened and Boom is “back in good standing.” 
“He’s back in good standing,” Stoops said. “He’s there. He was back for the Eastern game, he was back a few days and ever since then, he’s been back 100% and good to go.” 
It was good to see Boom cheering his teammates on on the sidelines during the Eastern game, something Stoops said gives him hope that the sophomore has learned from the experience. 
“I hope so. I believe so. That’s part of us building our program and growing and bringing along some young guys still. Just because we’ve talked about them for a year and a half means they’re grown yet. We have a lot of kids in that situation that we’re still trying to bring along. You know how we feel about playing in this league and competing at a high level. You better have some grown men. You’ve be grown, you’ve gotta be mature, and you’ve gotta have some depth.” 
Dawson said he’s also pleased with Boom’s attitude in practice. 
“He’s doing great. He’s got great energy, great attitude right now. Obviously we’re a better team with him on the field. I think he understands that and I think we understand that. We want him to be on the field as much as possible. We’re a lot better with him out there.” 
Welcome back, Boom. Article written by Mrs. Tyler Thompson No, I will not make you a sandwich, but you can follow me on Twitter @MrsTylerKSR or email me . Post Comment - New and Improved (not really, it just works now)
